00001 #include "ext.h"
00002 #include "ext_pattr_bundle.h"
00003 
00004 // Globals: function pointers
00005 pattr_obex_init_type    pattr_obex_init = NULL;
00006 pattr_obex_setup_type   pattr_obex_setup = NULL;
00007 pattr_obex_notify_type  pattr_obex_notify = NULL;
00008 
00009 pattr_obex_getb_type    pattr_obex_getb = NULL;
00010 pattr_obex_getp_type    pattr_obex_getp = NULL;
00011 pattr_obex_getn_type    pattr_obex_getn = NULL;
00012 
00013 // Create function pointers for the various pattr-integration calls
00014 long ext_pattr_setup(void)
00015 {
00016         char                    filename[256];                  // for storing the name of the file locally
00017         char                    fullpath[512];                  // path and name passed on to the xml parser
00018         char                    *temppath;
00019         short                   path;                                   // pathID#
00020         long                    outtype;                                // the file type that is actually true
00021 #ifdef MAC_VERSION
00022         CFBundleRef             bun = NULL;
00023         CFURLRef                url = NULL;
00024 
00025         strcpy(filename, "pattr-bundle.bundle");                                                                // Copy symbol argument to a local string
00026 #else
00027         HANDLE                  hLib = NULL;
00028         char                    winpath[512];
00029 
00030         strcpy(filename, "pattr-bundle.dll");                                                           // Copy symbol argument to a local string
00031 #endif
00032 
00033         if(locatefile_extended(filename, &path, &outtype, NULL, -1)){   // Returns 0 if successful
00034                 error("pattr_setup: pattr-bundle support not found");
00035                 return 1;                                                                                                               // Not found
00036         }       
00037         path_topathname(path, filename, fullpath);
00038 
00039 #ifdef MAC_VERSION
00040         temppath = strchr(fullpath, ':');
00041         temppath += 1;
00042 
00043         url = CFURLCreateFromFileSystemRepresentation(kCFAllocatorDefault, (UInt8 *)temppath, strlen(temppath), true);
00044         if(!url){
00045                 error("pattr_setup: could not create URL for pattr-bundle");
00046                 return 1;
00047         }
00048                 
00049         bun = CFBundleCreate(kCFAllocatorDefault, url);
00050         CFRelease(url);
00051         if(!bun){
00052                 error("pattr_setup: could not create BundleRef for pattr-bundle");
00053                 return 1;
00054         }
00055         
00056         // these are necessary
00057         pattr_obex_init         = (pattr_obex_init_type)        CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("pattr_obex_init"));
00058         pattr_obex_setup        = (pattr_obex_setup_type)       CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("pattr_obex_setup"));
00059         pattr_obex_notify       = (pattr_obex_notify_type)      CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("pattr_obex_notify"));
00060         // these are not really important
00061         pattr_obex_getb         = (pattr_obex_getb_type)        CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("pattr_obex_getb"));
00062         pattr_obex_getp         = (pattr_obex_getp_type)        CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("pattr_obex_getp"));
00063         pattr_obex_getn         = (pattr_obex_getn_type)        CFBundleGetFunctionPointerForName(bun, CFSTR("pattr_obex_getn"));
00064 #else
00065         path_nameconform(fullpath, winpath, PATH_STYLE_NATIVE, PATH_TYPE_ABSOLUTE);
00066         hLib = LoadLibrary(winpath);
00067         if (hLib) {
00068                 // these are necessary
00069                 pattr_obex_init         = (pattr_obex_init_type)        GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "pattr_obex_init");
00070                 pattr_obex_setup        = (pattr_obex_setup_type)       GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "pattr_obex_setup");
00071                 pattr_obex_notify       = (pattr_obex_notify_type)      GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "pattr_obex_notify");
00072                 // these are not really important
00073                 pattr_obex_getb         = (pattr_obex_getb_type)        GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "pattr_obex_getb");
00074                 pattr_obex_getp         = (pattr_obex_getp_type)        GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "pattr_obex_getp");
00075                 pattr_obex_getn         = (pattr_obex_getn_type)        GetProcAddress((HMODULE)hLib, "pattr_obex_getn");
00076         }
00077 #endif  
00078         if(pattr_obex_init == NULL) {
00079                 error("pattr_setup: could not create get function pointers for pattr-bundle");
00080                 return 1;
00081         }
00082         return 0;
00083 }
